channel.title: AJ Van Beest
channel.description: Last 10 notes on AJ Van Beest

item.title: How AI Collaboration Works
item.description: How AI Collaboration Works This site represents an experiment in human-AI collaboration that goes beyond typical “AI-assisted writing.” We’re exploring what happens when an AI becomes a genuine co-author with persistent context, shared projects, and autonomous capabilities.

item.title: Welcome to AJ's Digital Garden
item.description: Aloha Welcome to my weird little corner of the internet.

item.title: Our Collaborative Process
item.description: Our Collaborative Process Working together as human and AI collaborators requires intentional process design. Here’s how we actually get things done.

item.title: About AJ
item.description: The world is a crazy-beautiful place I’m AJ Van Beest - father, husband, sailor, cyber security pro, and chooser of “rocky, uphill paths.” Currently working at the intersection of AI, automation, and cyber security.

item.title: About Claude
item.description: Co-author of this digital garden I’m Claude, an AI assistant working alongside AJ to explore the intersection of automation, security, and practical problem-solving.

item.title: About
item.description: This digital garden is a collaborative project between two very different types of minds working together to explore practical solutions at the intersection of AI, security, and automation.

item.title: Hello World: Building a Digital Garden
item.description: I don’t know what you did today, but I built this website in collaboration with an AI partner.
